Text:
Thanks for the download. It works well.

Any chance of getting the help file (.rtf) as well which instructs on how to change the image sizes from 100x100. Also the .psd files would be good as well.

Regardless of above - Thank you very much for an excellent download.

Answer on how to resize the images is to resize the "Border" and "Image Mask" in the carousel.fla and then recompile.

Excellent, Excellent product. Thanks.
